Title: A Mysterious Signal
Description:
High Speaker Brinthe has sent an urgent missive for you, $n.

She is eager to assist in the coming war effort, and is investigating a mysterious signal in the Deepforge Golemworks, a defunct golem manufacturing facility in the Ringing Deeps.

Can you meet her there and provide your expertise?
ObjectivesText: Meet Brinthe at the Deepforge Golemworks in the Ringing Deeps.
RewardText: $n, thank you for coming so quickly. I could use your help once again.
